info.name: Lichess: JI Shogi-Themed Chess (1-Kanji)
info.description: Shogi-Themed Chess (Japanized Western Chess) on Lichess. Shogi (Japanese Chess) is the Japanese cousin of western chess and now you can play chess using shogi's board and 1-kanji pieces on Lichess. You can read more about it at JI Shogi-Themed Chess. Also check the 2-Kanji version at https://userstyles.org/styles/202618/lichess-ji-shogi-themed-chess-2-kanji You can also visit JI Shogi-Themed Chess's Github repository.
info.additionalInfo:
- Board and pieces included
- Works with all variants
- Works with matches, puzzles, analysis and board editor
- Available in 2D

============

Updated June 19, 2024. Previous version no longer works as Lichess updated their codes. Kindly uninstall and reinstall if you have a version prior to June 19, 2024.
